mapper.sql: policy_no, endorse_no, addr_no, treaty_year, treaty_no, risk_no, duty_bgn, duty_end, acct_type, treaty_type, amt_tsi, amt, prem, amt_typ, prem_typ, amt_ear, prem_ear, share_amt, share_prem, share_amt_typ, share_prem_typ, share_amt_ear, share_prem_ear, remark, treaty_mode, calc_date, bill_date, calc_user, acct_flag, iendorsement2, policy_dprt
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from fri_treaty_shares
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fri_treaty_shares (policy_no, endorse_no, addr_no, treaty_year, treaty_no, risk_no, duty_bgn, duty_end, acct_type, treaty_type, amt_tsi, amt, prem, amt_typ, prem_typ, amt_ear, prem_ear, share_amt, share_prem, share_amt_typ, share_prem_typ, share_amt_ear, share_prem_ear, remark, treaty_mode, calc_date, bill_date, calc_user, acct_flag, iendorsement2, policy_dprt) values (#{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addrNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{treatyYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyBgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dutyEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{acctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amtTsi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shareAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sharePrem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shareAmtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sharePremTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shareAmtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sharePremEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treatyMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calcDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{calcUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iendorsement2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyDprt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update fri_treaty_shares
policy_no = #{record.policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endorse_no = #{record.endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_no = #{record.addrNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
treaty_year = #{record.treatyYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treaty_no = #{record.treatyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
risk_no = #{record.riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duty_bgn = #{record.dutyBgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duty_end = #{record.dutyEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
acct_type = #{record.acctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treaty_type = #{record.treatyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amt_tsi = #{record.amtTsi,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem = #{record.prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_typ = #{record.amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_typ = #{record.premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amt_ear = #{record.amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prem_ear = #{record.premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
share_amt = #{record.shareAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
share_prem = #{record.sharePrem,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
share_amt_typ = #{record.shareAmtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
share_prem_typ = #{record.sharePremTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
share_amt_ear = #{record.shareAmtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
share_prem_ear = #{record.sharePremEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
treaty_mode = #{record.treatyMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
calc_date = #{record.calcDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bill_date = #{record.billDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
calc_user = #{record.calcUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acct_flag = #{record.acctFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iendorsement2 = #{record.iendorsement2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
policy_dprt = #{record.policyDprt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update fri_treaty_shares set policy_no = #{record.policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endorse_no = #{record.endorseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_no = #{record.addrNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, treaty_year = #{record.treatyYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, treaty_no = #{record.treatyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, risk_no = #{record.riskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duty_bgn = #{record.dutyBgn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duty_end = #{record.dutyEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, acct_type = #{record.acctType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, treaty_type = #{record.treatyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amt_tsi = #{record.amtTsi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem = #{record.prem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_typ = #{record.amtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_typ = #{record.premTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amt_ear = #{record.amtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prem_ear = #{record.premEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, share_amt = #{record.shareAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, share_prem = #{record.sharePrem,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, share_amt_typ = #{record.shareAmtTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, share_prem_typ = #{record.sharePremTyp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, share_amt_ear = #{record.shareAmtEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, share_prem_ear = #{record.sharePremEar,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, treaty_mode = #{record.treatyMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, calc_date = #{record.calcDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bill_date = #{record.billDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, calc_user = #{record.calcUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acct_flag = #{record.acctFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iendorsement2 = #{record.iendorsement2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_dprt = #{record.policyDprt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
